Setting Timezone in Redhat Linux

  • Delete the localtime file
    rm /etc/localtime
  • Link the correct zone file to /etc/localtime
    ls /usr/share/zoneinfo/US/
Alaska  Aleutian  Arizona  Central  Eastern  East-Indiana  Hawaii  Indiana-Starke  Michigan  Mountain  Pacific  Samoa
  • Set the correct one
    sudo ln -s /usr/share/zoneinfo/US/Central /etc/localtime
